title: UFYB 64: How to Believe Harder
itunes:title: How to Believe Harder
description:
Join me this week to learn how to believe new things harder. I share the three mistakes I see in thought work when people are not believing hard enough and how to get past them. Believing new things on purpose is work. It's going to feel like work. That's the good news. Because the good news is if it feels terrible sometimes, you're doing it right.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfckyourbrain.com/64
